title: Bug 118351Predefine style in library cannot refresh in layout
description: Bug 118351Predefine style in library cannot refresh in layout Named theme1 and theme2, style1 and style2.2.Open a report design and insert a label.Actual result:No matter what theme is selected, the background color has not been changed in layout.Expected result:Select a theme, background color of label in layout is changed.
OB: Details:Predefine style in library cannot refresh in layoutStep:1.New a library and create two themes and two label predefine style with yellow and green background color.
